reviews_data.review_text: Love there drip coffee!

Nice and large coffee spot to work.
Coffee can be good, but quality isn't stable. It's a hit or miss.
Service is terribly slow

Recently had a great coffee date with some friends. Great coffee, goodies, and loads of laughs. Can't wait to do it again!  Thanks, Team
Waterbean!
Nice place for social gatherings

We got 6 coffees, 2 hot lattes which were delicious, 3 frappes and 1 iced coffee. The frappes were terrible, literally tasted like milk and sugar, no coffee flavor whatsoever. They told me the frappes are made with cold brew and I suggested mine to be made with espresso shots so it actually tastes like coffee but they just made it with more cold brew than the first time and sadly it still tasted like milk and sugar just a little bit less icy. I love the place and atmosphere and as long as you get hot coffee you can't go wrong but the frappes could be a LOT better.

Good coffee and nice place but terrible customer service. Rude and unpleasant service from the women working on 7/21. No customer service skills. Too bad. This place is close to my house so we could have been repeat customers.
No customer service skills. All attitude and rude.
There are 4 of us real estate agents that meet weekly!  This is one of our favorite spots!

The barista didn't know much about how they brew some of their coffee. The coffee was all right. Definitely better than a Starbucks or a Dunkin. I got their white mocha latte. Wish they had a 24oz cup too
My first experience with expresso and coffee flights (great to share). Excellent spacious shop with a great coffee selection and atmosphere.

I just went to the Huntersville location. Ordered a coffee and bagel the lady attending us was so rude. No eye contact and a B face. It was like we were bothering her. Both ladies behind the counter were very unpleasant - no good morning , no smile , no thank you no have a nice day . Nothing. Just placed our order about four feet away from where I was standing and just walked away. CompletELY RUDE B!
Love the open space. The service is mediocre at this specific location. Coffee is pretty good each time we go, but I definitely prefer the one close to Park Road. They're phenomenal over there
Awesome coffee
Great atmosphere
Great spot

Super clean and bright coffee shop! This is a wonderful place to setup shop for a couple of hours and get work or studying done. Constant stream of people and the tables fill up fast around 9-10AM. Highly recommend!
Best coffee in Huntersville
GF chocolate chip muffins and cookies with great coffee!
Not great service
Super cute! Nice vibes, great place to hangout/work
Great coffee, wasn't expecting a piano and wine bar.  Very interesting.

The ladies working here are always great! I come in at least once a week right now and spend a few hours there each time. I come back for the nice atmosphere, great service, and comfortable chairs!

Edit: 6/9/22
Still love this place!!! So happy they survived covid

Edit: 3/2/24
STILLLLL love this place! What a wonderful spot for focusing & getting some uninterrupted work done. I have always love the people they hire here, current staff is no exception!

Edit: 5/9/24
Seriously, nothing new to say, love the staff & the vibe.
Nice place with a comfortable, positive vibe-first time there, and I'm not even a coffee drinker. In other words, a great, local alternative to the usual. Better food, too! Nice experience.
Best coffee shop around. Expensive but worth it.

Waterbean seems like your average corporate cafe. The coffee they roast isn't offensive, but it's not really anything special. Large, relatively dark, open area good for studying or work. Craft drinks seem creative, but I've never had the courage to try one. Also, there are tons of coffee brewing methods available, but every espresso is a blend.
Waterbean is good if you don't really care about coffee but want to support local.
Great coffee shop with friendly staff. Sometimes in the busy part of the morning the tables will need cleaning but overall a great place!
Bought 2 award winning coffees. They were both great!
Lots of choices, but must contain lots of sugar.
I had a blind date here. The drinks were great. I like the environment.  The coffee shop was a great decision, the blind date went well also.
Great spot for a nice sandwich, great coffee and getting some work done with all of the seating options.
my Monday 7am stop every Monday , & a few days in between.

My first time visiting.  Very nice location,  I really enjoyed my cappuccino.  They have a wonderful selection of goodies to choose from, and the sandwiches looked really good. I spent time here on a blind date. Vert well lit and comfortable for such an occasion.  I'll definitely visit Waterbean Coffee again.
Excellent coffee, food and ambiance!

I really enjoyed coming here to work. The ambiance was so relaxed. It was a great vibe to mix up working from home. The chai tea was the best I've ever had. It was spacious and plenty of seating options. I definitely will come back.
Comfortable
Quaint place to visit with friendly staff.
I loved the iced coffee
Very good coffee.
Perfect place for a good coffee and to concentrate .

Their lattes beat out Starbucks in my opinion, PLUS awesome macaroons.

Get after it.
Relaxing spot. People playing chess or some board game.
Food was 10/10 coffee was 10/10 better than Starbucks!!! Definitely worth it.
The coffee was just okay in my opinion. The bagels are good.

I ordered a Large Latte (it comes with 2 shots of espresso), but it was frothy with no crema, making me think it might be under-extracted. I requested a replacement with 4 shots because the coffee was overly milky, and I couldn't taste the beans.

The server took my cup, added another shot of espresso on top, and returned it as is. This action felt rude to me. When I asked again, expressing my willingness to pay more, I requested a latte with 4 shots.

However, I was charged 10 bucks for another Large, disappointing, frothy coffee, once again.

Despite paying for the coffee again, it turned out to be even worse. I was charged twice (20 bucks) for subpar coffee.

In the meantime, the owner came out and inquired about the coffee issue, but the server interrupted, claiming she had taken care of it.

I'm uncertain if there was a racist undertone, perhaps because of my ethnicity, but the overall experience left me feeling that the service was very rude.
Nice spot to sit,chill, or read. The coffee is okay it hasn't been a hit for me yet.

Love Waterbean. Good experiences with this company, from when I lived next to the first location and met the owner all the way to now.

This location is special to me because it's a place where my Long-distance girlfriend can practice and perform piano when she visits since I don't have a piano perosnally and get her other work done. As a couple we have nothing but praise for this place.
Great treats, great drinks, great atmosphere. Very helpful, friendly staff.
Wonderful place to get a tasty breakfast and great coffee!
Great coffee and friendly service

I had an excellent experience at this Waterbean!

I've always loved the atmosphere. Perfect coffee house ambiance with nice music and plenty of places to sit. The parking lot is plentiful.

My girlfriend and I split three lattes off the seasonal menu. The thin mint, Irish cream, and cinnamon roll. Each one of them was nicely balanced and not too sweet. Perfect latte foam and even nice art to go with it. The foam lasted for hours!

We also both got food. I recommend the ribeye melt it is pure flavor town. The lox bagel has a generous amount of lox on it. Our only nitpicking critique is to chop the onions a little finer. That would shoot it over the moon.

It was moderately busy when we came in and we got our drinks and food quickly. I would definitely come back!
Nice coffee shop, clean & pretty atmosphere. Not crowded like the chains
Only place I know that I can get French press coffee

When I walked in, I was immersed by the lovely smell of coffee. After I gave my order, I waited while young kids ran around the store, ok cool, just kids. But something that rubbed me the wrong way was after I order, the two people that ordered after me got their food and coffee before me. I just had a latte. And while I was waiting, the young lady behind the counter asked me, "Hey, can I help you with something?" I'm like. Yeah I just ordered. Idk. Maybe my dark skin scared the young lady. I guess being Black is just a crime in itself. It was very strange energy.
Top quality french press, amazing baristas, frovourulus atmospherical situation.
Excellent location and fantastic coffee experience. Service was friendly and very helpful. The atmosphere was relaxing and enjoyable. I look forward to visiting again next time I'm in town.
Never coming back.  Barrista forgot my order, waited more than 20 mins for a regular latte.
Always great for a good cup of caffeine and a croissant. They are always packed but I hardly ever have to wait.
Good, work-friendly coffee shop with indoor and outdoor seating. Great coffee, service, and food options.
Really cool location, staff were friendly and helpful and coffee is excellent!
Great place, outstanding latte and espresso!
Cool hangout place. Amazing coffees.

I really like the cafe, there were lots of people working and meeting. Very clean, and the coffee is great, much better than its competitor. The associate who took my order and prepared my iced coffee coffee was by herself and apparently very stressed.  That's my only complaint.   It's a lovely cafe.

This Waterbean has a nice atmosphere, and the piano is a nice touch when there's someone to play it.  When I was there, someone played beautifully.

Oddly, the kitchen area has a super loud refrigerator that buzzes constantly over the music.

Overall, really good.

Omg this place is so good. We enjoyed sitting here with our beverages and snacks while it rained heavily on a late Sunday afternoon. We had their hot rose latte, iced snickerdoodle latte, broccoli and cheddar quiche and peach turnover, and loved them all. The ambience, customer service, food and drinks were all on point. Would love to visit again.

Fine coffee and breakfast sandwiches! Much better compared to the airline coffee. Was hoping for a delightful pattern in my cortado. They have a piano reserved for Mozart. There is also a small conference room.
Mary is the BEST!!

Before my review: If you're not familiar with the shopping center, you can't see the shop easily from the main roads. If you pull in near Target, it's your first left after the gas station. If you enter on the Lowes side, you have to turn right, once you see the pond, it will be across from you.

If you're a black coffee drinker, this is a great place to get a good pour over or french press. A lot of non-chain coffee shops only have good espresso drinks but their standard coffee is mediocre, this place isn't one of those. Many if not all of their coffee selections are organic.

They also have pretty good pastries and sandwiches. There are also a lot of vegan options including pastries.
Muy lindo el ambiente y el servicio
Best coffee shop ever.
Great place to meet
Coffee was good, but it wasn't that hot. Paid 6 bucks for a very small cup of cappuccino.  I think that's pricey. They could do better than that.
coffee was good but expensive might as well go to mcdonald's for same quality coffee for cheaper 2 black coffees there were 7 dollars while mcdonald's is 2 bfor 2 dollars
For a quiet WFH day or a good breakfast stop on your way to work... yes!
This might have been the worst thing I've ever put in my mouth, I tried a coffee and a tea neither were good.

The coffee is terrible. We got a cold brew and a frappe and they both are awful. The cold brew tastes sour and burnt which is crazy because how do you even burn cold brew?! And the frappe wasn't even made with espresso. The coffee is less than good and there's not enough flavor to overcome it. I wish I could get my money back. And the service wasn't great. The servers look like they wish they could be anywhere else. I own a coffee shop so I know they can do better. The bathrooms were clean tho.

Second time visiting, my first experience was better. The server who made my drink was not really friendly and she was coughing  although she turned away not good around food & drinks. This will probably be my last as my green tea frappe didn't help my experience.

i come here all the time with my friends and it's absolutely amazing every time. they have an extensive menu of both food and drinks. they use manual espresso machines here which i love. they offer vegan and gluten free options as well! i always get an iced vanilla oat milk latte. if you're going for food, i'll recommend the bacon egg and cheese croissant or the vegan strawberry crumble muffin.
Nice coffee shop.
Perfect vibe. Delicious tea & treats. I was there for a poetry reading and it was so awesome.

Awesome l

arge coffee house, lots of different choices of coffee...french press, aeropress, vietnamese, etc.
Favorite place to go with mixed company, waterbean has something to satisfy every taste. I enjoy the relaxed, contemporary atmosphere.

Fancy coffee is not my normal thing. However we were out shopping and passing by so went in to give it a try.  No disappointments. Server/barista was EXCELLENT. Explaining everything with great detail and precision. Had a machiatto (spelling) coffee with a lemon and blueberry scone. The coffee was smooth tasty and warm However it did cool very quickly. The scone was unimpressive. Almost tasteless and dry. Not really my thing.   Store was exceptionally clean and full of customers.
Nice place to work
I loved the Sakura rose tea when they had it for limited time and the jasmine tea was good too

Really disappointed in this location and it used to be decent. The coffee quality is mediocre at best. Had an Americano that I could barely drink. It tasted like watered down gas station coffee. No drip decaf. Penalty fees for drinking plant-based milks. Outside sitting area was dirty and hadn't been swept in awhile. Staff wasn't busy, hanging out on their phones. They could have been washing dishes, cleaning tables, sweeping the outside. Anything would be better than nothing.
Best coffee shop around. The attention to details is unmatched! Great espresso and friendly staff.

Great space and ambiance, bathrooms are clean and the staff was nice. But the coffee was incredibly mediocre and the food way over priced for the quality. I got a lox sandwich on a bagel that I could barley bite through it was so stiff. Sanitation grade is also pretty low for my standards (93.4). Don't plan on returning due to food quality.

Really enjoyed my first trip here.  Very relaxed setting, plenty of seating.    The two baristas were really nice and helpful.

Also very happy to have found a place that doesn't close at 7pm!

Always friendly and helpful staff... Always fun and different drinks.  My favorite is the pistachio black tea with one pump of simple syrup.

Most coffee shops I find difficult to go to, but this place is not bad.  A big plus is that it is locally owned.
Good coffee but way overpriced
Great place to meet and share. Lots of churches represented. Serve the Lord with Gladness.

First time impression - this is really good! Wide variety of coffees and preparations, and looks like they've got wines and local beers on tap for later in the day. I'm usually a bagel breakfast sandwich kinda guy, but the "Morning Sunshine" on croissant was great.

It's a nice space too - clean, not crowded. I'll be back!
Water bean is my favorite local specialty coffee shop for meetings. It's quiet there is plenty of seating and the coffee is good. Free wi-fi.

I wanted a gingerbread cookie but my usual bakery was closed for the day so since he was in the parking lot doing other shopping, my husband stopped by Waterbean to see what they had. He picked up what they called a gingerbread scone for me and a blueberry muffin for himself. First of all I was shocked that two items cost $10. Secondly, the scone was one of the worst things I've ever had. It didn't taste like gingerbread or cinnamon, or nutmeg, or ginger it had a weird sour taste. It was extremely dry and not sweet at all. It did not have the texture of a scone. More like dry coarse bread. Needless to say I couldn't eat it. I tried a piece of the muffin and again was very disappointed. It was gummy and dense. Completely inedible. So we wasted $10 and got nothing. I won't go back there again.
Wonderful!
Great staff, great coffee, beautiful atmosphere!

Good coffee, cool ambiance, and amazing tea but I feel that the staff could be much friendlier here. I have been coming to Waterbean locations for several years and was quite shocked. The Waterbean locations in Hickory, NC are *amazing* but here in Huntersville the staff were impatient, constant frowns on their faces, and seem to not care at all. Was not impressed. Came in Sunday 11/20 at 11 AM.
It's a vibe
Always a great experience at Waterbean Coffee
Friendly service and good quality drinks. I tried coffee brewed via the siphon method which was fun to watch and tasted quite good. My daughters enjoyed a taro milk tea with boba and an iced coffee.
Great place to do some work. The coffee and staff are amazing.

We always love coming to Waterbean. We are regulars at both Lake Norman locations! Service is always friendly, coffee is always amazing. We measure any other coffee shops we visit against Waterbean's amazing coffee! Food and drinks are *chef's kiss*

Gah, this place is so inconsistent. One day I'm like, "Man, best little coffee shop around." Thenother times like last night it worse than McDonanalds.

My wife wanted me to take her there to celebrate her birthday with some coffee flights. We settled in on the couches, waiting. Straight up salt water. Which having spoken to a buddy who's a coffee connoisseur, they didn't pull the espresso correctly. We ordered 4 flights for all of us. That's 24 shots of espresso, ruined. So disappointing. So we ordered some coffee and on our way we went.

I visited Waterbean for the first time yesterday. I met a friend for  and collaboration and loved everything about the experience! The coffee was delicious, reasonably priced and the service was excellent. The atmosphere was perfect with so many different options for spreading out. All the seating was equipped with power supply and sufficient surface space to set up for business use and they offer secure Wifi! Thank you, I'll definitely be back.
I love it here! Chill vibes. Great Coffee. Good food.
They have changed their decor a little. The service was great  Thanks.
Their coffee and morning snacks are always delicious and their staff are super nice too!
Good coffee and gluten free/vegan options
Locally owned coffee shop with pastries, etc. Reasonably priced and nice atmosphere. Great coffee

First time in and I loved it. There were lots of room and tables around for people to get together and socialize over maybe the best iced mocha that I have ever had. Will definitely go back if I'm in the area.
Excellent atmosphere. It got a Vietnamese coffee and a coffee cake. The cake was delicious and a huge slice. The coffee was very good, but quite small for the price.
Love this place. Staff are great and helpful. Place is very clean and spacious. We go there all the time.
Coffee is consistently good and atmosphere is great
Coffe is good. But the bagel they served was stale.
10/10 every time my team and I work from Waterbean. Great service, and somehow they attract the best patrons. My favorites: Peanut Butter Latte or a Snickerdoodle Latte!
Great coffee, service, and atmosphere. One of my favorites in the Charlotte area.

Superior coffee, and great staff
Love the place for the conference e room that is my default office since 2020

Aesthetics are incredible. A city type coffee shop tucked away in a small county with a great atmosphere. The coffee is amazebeans, not too sweet, or bland. We were going to Starbucks and saw a local shop and I'm glad we chose them instead
$7 for this coffee

My wife and I love WB's coffee and atmosphere. They have a good selection of tasty pastries and sandwiches. Parking can get tough when they are busy. They have conference rooms to reserve for meetings as well.  Staff is very friendly and professional. I recommend the Good Morning Vietnam coffee with a breakfast cookie!
Bought bobba with our kids ,we liked it
Nice atmosphere. Not crowded.
As a busy REALTOR(r) I popped in early 8:15am. Zoey, and Asia took expedite care of my order quickly. They are a joy. The Best kept Secret are their Macaroons. Trust me, Try One!
Friendly service and some pretty good coffee!
Our 1st time here. I had gotten a cold foam snickerdoodle latte, it was sooooo good!! 10/10, Husband got a Nitro cold brew.
Love this place
Great plac efor coffee and a snack. I only had coffee. I was there for a business meeting and it was quit with a great atmosphere. I would definitely go back and try the food.
So slow and average products

Great place tucked away in Huntersville.

Loved the matcha latte (oat milk), and banana bread. They offer a full coffee bar and ice cream too. Love their tall drip coffee setup, very intricate and cool.

The inside was nice and quiet (great place to get some work done) and the chairs were comfortable and offered a variety of seating. Had high top tables, sofa chairs, and normal tables to accommodate all study/work/social settings perfectly. The staff was friendly and helpful, definitely would visit again.

Nice coffee place with relaxed vibe. Can attest the blueberry muffins are absolutely edible.  Chocolate chip cookie was a tad salty,  but generous chunks made up for it. Coffee was fresh and hot and weird requests are handled with aplomb.
Cute decor,  ample comfy seating,  wifi, magazines. Numerous groups working over computers and chatting quietly,  but the lay out allows solitude too. They have succeeded in creating a "sit and stay" oasis in an otherwise unremarkable strip mall.
So glad we found this place. Moving to Huntersville area and coffee is always one of the first things we look for. They also have great food.
Great and friendly staff. Quality drinks made quickly. Good environment for meetings or studying.
A very clean establishment.  Staff helpful. Lovely coffee.
Great spacious place to work with good coffee flavors , Vietnamese one is a must try. The staff is very friendly.
Roomier and less crowded than Starbucks. My favorite place to meet over coffee
Nice, roomy, but cozy location. Friendly staff
The moment you step inside you know it's going to be great just from the fresh aroma that awakens the senses. Super friendly staff.
Super nice people, great coffee and a side room for meetings!
Coffee is really good but baristas didn't seem very interested. I asked about there awards but they didn't have any Information about them.
A very good place to do a job interview or just have a nice drink
Good coffee and tea. Casual atmosphere and comfortable to hang out.
A bit noisy, but great coffee!

Excellent coffee! Came back a second day while I was in town. The blueberry muffin was also excellent. Not overly sweet like most bakeries. So soft and moist! I wish I lived here so I could frequent the shop.

Neglected place. Dirty tables with cookie crumbs, overflowing garbage, disheveled menus around, dusty corners with age old dust bunnies,  unhygienic washroom. Employees sit idle when they could maintain and love this cute place. Coffee is decadent, but it's unfortunate to see such disrespect for surroundings and the whole cafe presentation.
A nice place for small meetings, but they always seem to be out of basic sandwich ingredients, diet soda, and tonight even lager beer.
Beautiful place to stay for a cofee
Very good
Excellent experience. Very clean. Awesome place to just get away for a chat or some good java!
Very good coffee.
Excellent coffee with great atmosphere.
I am not a coffee drinker, but the coffee at this place makes me a want to drink coffee.

Hi, the barista I had messed up my order and laughed at me when I nicely asked about it. I am at Waterbean on Sam Furr road in Hunterville and I ordered a mango boba blended with popping boba inside. I order this same drink every time and usually get the same thing every time. Today Wednesday november 3rd at 3:55 pm I ordered the same thing I have every time and instead of it being orange like it has been every time I order it, the drink was brown. I asked the younger barista with brown hair if it was mango flavor and she said "yes, that's what you wanted right?" And I said yes and took a sip and it tasted nothing like mango was creamy instead of sweet like normal. I went back and said hi sorry to bother you i'm not sure if this is mango and she said "no it is mango, I made it" and I decided I'd rather not fight her about it. What caused me to really write this is that she was talking to two of her friends who were studying at the high top the entire time I was ordering, and while I walked away the 2nd time she said to her friend "Wow, didn't know you worked here" and laughed at me. This is the first time I've had a bad time at water bean and that was completely uncalled for especially when I have ordered this drink almost 100 times and never had it be brown.This is extremely disrespectful of her especially after I added a nice tip to my order for her.
The website only allows for 80 characters in the comments so I decided to leave a review...

Nice coffee shop. Large and open feeling, friendly staff. We went midday and there were only a handful of other people around, so it was quiet. Great place to get some work done or study. Nice ambience. Coffee/pastries aren't amazing, but they're still good, if a bit pricey.
Waterbean offers great tea and coffee with pastries and plenty of room to work, relax, and chat. My favorite breakfast spot in North Mecklenburg County
This place is awesome  #LestGuide
Love the coffee here! Staff are great as well!
Delicious mochas and pastries.
Was great some of the best coffee
Amazing atmosphere! Friendly staff and tasty drinks!
I ordered the only thing I could drink which was a smoothie. The smoothie was great I just wish they had more options for people that don't drink coffee or tea. I understand that it's a coffee shop.
I love the seating arrangement, cute place! Good lattes

The coffee here is great but that's about it. The food is good but feels overpriced if you're trying to feed a few kids. We stopped here for breakfast after staying in a nearby hotel. There is tons of outdoor seating and there is a green space right in front that was great for kids to run around. The bathrooms were awful however and when you have kids it just super disappointing to have to manage that process in a nasty bathroom. The garbage cans in the stalls were completely full from the day before (we were there before 8am)  and the cobwebs hanging from the ceiling were covered in dust so it's been a while since that bathroom had a good cleaning. The handicap stall was also super dusty- the walls, the baseboards, the handicap rails . If you just want a nice coffee its a great break from Starbucks but just go somewhere else to pee.
An amazing coffee shop with a nice atmosphere!
Delicious coffee!
The coffee and treats are too expensive.

The best local coffee ! Drip cold brew siphon pour over Thai style cappuccinos cold blended drinks they have it all and do it very well ! As well as having very nice baked goods and fresh beans and espresso for sale ! Love this place

Waterbean always delivers on giving you a great cop of coffee and experience! Their baristas are friendly and kind, pastries are delicious and lattes are the best around. Once you try Waterbean you won't enjoy coffee from anywhere else!
Nice hangout place for a sip of coffee.
Oh my gosh. I never knew about this place until a friend recommended it! So so so so good and the employees were so nice and helpful.
Love this place.  Good meet-up spot.  Clean and socially distanced.

My go-to! The only weird experience is there's a girl who works some days who might beat the world record on how many times she can call you "ma'am" in one order time. It's okay to use it a few times, but she sounds like a computer when she uses it after ever other word. But hey...
A great alternative to Starbucks. Their coffee tastes a hell of a lot better too.
Lauren is amazing!! She assisted me with an urgent business need (which she did not have to) but she did graciously and I am forever grateful! The Environment is even better!!!
This Waterbean is by far my favorite coffee shop to come study at. The atmosphere is great and there's plenty of space for seating, and the coffee is soooo good!!
Always love coming here. Delicious coffee, cool atmosphere, excellent waitstaff.
One of the best iced lattes I've ever had! Nice staff good environment, covid safe with plenty of outside seating.
Love their space, especially during these Corona times. Service is excellent and coffee taste good. Place is better than Starbucks
Excellent coffee and cool decor
Phenomenal coffee
Best coffee. Loved my egg and cheese croissant.
New favorite spot!
Coffee was great- ordered a regular coffee and a caramel coffee- great service and friendly staff!
Good servings, cool staff!
This location is terrible. The servers are super rude.
Good service, coffee and macaroons. Enjoyed the atmosphere and decor. Very nice. Recommend you check them out.

Great place to grab a nook with a family member and get out for a little while.
Nice selection og coffee teas and wine

Nice place with friendly staff, but its way too cold in there.  The staff say they have been instructed by the owner not to turn up the heat or turn on the gas fireplace.  I could barely feel my fingers while trying to work in here.  Other than this comfort, would recommend for take out unless your a penguin.
I tend to forget how their coffee has good flavor! I went to grab a cup for the afternoon, & I got lost in the coffee lingo. I'll just stick to the simple drinks!
I really enjoyed my herbal tea.  The atmosphere is very comfortable.   Lots of room to sit and ask the chairs are padded.  There are lots of choices of drinks.  The server was very helpful.
Great prices and service.

I love this place. Service, food and atmosphere are excellent.  I also find the employees to be very friendly, happy and cordial.

THIS IS A LOCALLY OWNED BUSINESS SO I DRIVE FURTHER FOR THEIR COFFEE TO PATRONIZE SMALL BUSINESS OWNERS. PLEASE CONSIDER DOING THE SAME.
Meh
I've been here two times... But I can see why coffee officianados come here! If you want quality... You do not have to search far!
Great coffee, lots of seating options to safely space inside. They also serve delicious macaroons and have beer!

I am always on a lookout for a well made Cortado and viola I found it right here in Huntersville. Water bean coffee has some wonderful servings of coffee and tea. It serves some gourmet sandwiches too. Will surely visit again!
Had the Honduran pour over, good cup of joe, a cigar would've capped it off nicely. Blueberry muffin was outstanding. Staff very friendly and welcoming

The quality and selection of pour over coffee's and waterbean is great. I would like to see a better selection of craft espresso drinks.

They have interesting snack and food options. I've tried mochi in their Macarons neither of which seemed overly fresh. They also have beer and wine; however, the worker said all the beer on tap was flat.

The coffee shop has a decent amount a place for seating, and a meeting room if needed.
I come here every time I am in town! It's the best! I get a latte with macadamia nut milk.
Beautiful atmosphere and vibe
Great vibe, great service, good coffee, and most importantly,  free WIFI!
Super awesome coffee and amazing service!
Me encanta.where open Huntersville Nc
Friendly staff. Great selection of Tea
Clean and quaint coffee spot with indoor/outdoor seating.
Very friendly and great atmosphere to enjoy your coffee!

I had a mocha and breakfast sandwich. Both were good! All sandwiches come with a sauce which I omitted. The staff was friendly and efficient. The cafe was extremely cozy. We sat outside due to our comfort and it was a beautiful day outside. I believe there was a fountain outside too which would have been wonderfully relaxing had it been on.
Good service

Good coffee drinks, hot or cold. My kids had a strawberry smoothie and I had a few sips....it was quite good.

Though the sea salt Carmel brownies had chocolate chips but I didn't even taste Carmel in them.
Service was great, coffee was tasty, bathrooms were awful. Grab your coffee and go.
Super clean environment and they have the best coffee around.
Great coffee, fairly priced and good atmosphere. Will be back time and time again.

I've been to this shop several times. About 10 times approximately. I particularly enjoy the pour overs. I get pour overs ever time. Sometimes regular size sometimes the 16oz. Today was no different. However, much to my surprise when the barista handed me my to go cup today it felt a bit on the light side. When I opened the cup, I see that she's handed me half a cup of coffee. I asked her AND the other barista on shift why this was and they both stated that that's what a pour over is. I explained that the many other times I've ordered this drink it's never a half a cup of coffee. The response "I don't know what happened those other times, but that's what a pour over is." (To be fair, they weren't rude, just clueless) Uuummmm, no, this it's what a pour over is. I dropped the issue cause frankly, they were clueless, no point in continuing a conversation that was going nowhere. But where it SHOULD have gone was the baristas doing anything within their power to figure out what went wrong.  And also, my pour over tasted watered down  A watered down, half a cup of coffee....

So now I'm wondering, am I going to have to go back to Starbucks for my pour over wants? I prefer Waterbean. But mostly I prefer CONSISTENCY. I hope whoever manages this place sees this review. The two baristas that were on shift today would probably work better with more experienced baristas, because together they are a clueless situation.

I'll go back to Waterbean. Hopefully I won't encounter this situation again.

Large store with plenty of seating.  There are a few couches , a fireplace and a ton of 4 top tables. There is wine, tea , coffee and smoothies available as well as some baked goods and sandwiches. This is a great place to meet a client or to get a group together at.
Great spot to work on the laptop and have a coffee or tea.  Live music some nights adds a great ambiance.  I love their peach ginger hot tea.
Really nice place. A little pricey and way too quiet for me.
Great place enjoyed.
Best coffee in Huntersville.
Really liked this place, we went in very late and were treated well cool place to sit down and have a coffee.
Love this place!

The service is great - servers are all helpful and courteous, but the men's bathroom (toilet) is gross, broken toilet seat, dirty.  This unfortunately really detracts from a great work and meeting spot.
Customer service, super helpful and friendly
It was cool!
Awesome staff and great coffee! A great place to go work and a very communal space.
Great place for a good pick me up
Amazing drink and snack options, service, and atmosphere.

Very nice place, great food and drink and wonderful place to conduct meetings with friends and/or colleagues.
Yes great coffee
Good casual meeting amd breakfast/lunch place.
Chill atmosphere

Great coffee shop with very friendly staff, lots of private little corners to work or meet with friends/co-workers, free Wi-Fi, cozy atmosphere with your choice of couches, comfy chairs, tables/chairs, or a large private meeting space available. They even have live music on the weekend evenings.
Didn't really like the coffee. Looking for something other than Starbucks but wont be here. Looks like I'll be sticking with Starbucks until I find another coffee place.
Nice place to have a hot Drink with your girls or a nice date night.
Nice setting with a pretty good variety of coffee shop good.
Too expensive.
Coffee love. May you be well.
Great place to hang or work
Their coffee is phenomenal, always tasty. It has such a great, comfortable atmosphere. Always clean, employees are always kind and happy to make recommendations!
Great interior, lots of chairs and places to relax.  Only problem is our chai latte and hot chocolates were so watery and lacked flavor.
Great coffee and great food! Great place if you want to sit and chat with someone for a while. Large variety. Highly reccomend you try it!
Love this cozy coffee house with great service, pastries and teas for us non coffee people
Yummy coffee!!!!
Very unique shop with a comfortable atmosphere and friendly staff.

Decaf coffee is somewhat bitter.  The young lady that took my order was nice but the other girl was short, not hospitable, and threw the regular coffee in sink when I asked her to make a decaf instead of regular,, I made a mistake when ordering.  Over all experience was ok.

This place is a hidden pearl. Amazing coffee, staff and comfy/accesible place to work. Great atmosphere. Love it!
You will not be disappointed with the quality roasts, fun and friendly environment and super speed wifi.  Perfect for an everytime of day latte and has a great conference room for small gatherings.
